entry.title: Russian Soldier Sentenced to Life in Prison in Ukraine War-Crimes Trial
entry.content: Vadim Shishimarin, a Russian tank-unit sergeant, was convicted of premeditated murder in Ukraine’s first war-crimes trial since the invasion began in February.

entry.title: Suspected Graves at Canada's Indigenous Schools Prompt Search for Answers
entry.content: Since the​detection of the suspected graves in May 2021, indigenous communities have come forward with information about more than 1,000 possible unmarked graves at or near the school sites.

entry.title: Ukraine's Forces Sink Russian River Crossings, Inflicting Heavy Damage
entry.content: Bridging water in combat is dangerous, complex and demands precise coordination, say veterans. Moscow’s forces have failed repeatedly.
